item.title: Open Science: replicability, reproducibility, and robustness
item.description: This is an open book I am currently writing on Open Science — covering replicability, reproducibility, and robustness — to provide students with a solid foundation for conducting high-quality research. A selection of exemplary chapters is available.

item.title: Open Science: from replication crisis to credibility revolution
Consulting
item.description:
I offer consulting and courses on statistical modeling and inference.

Exemplary courses:

  • statistical reasoning and inference
  • (generalized) linear (mixed) models
  • bayesian cognitive modeling in Stan

Crunching the numbers and fine-tuning the courses – launching soon! Stay tuned.
